definition: A means of establishing communication or connection with someone or something, often involving physical interaction or exchange of information. It is commonly used to refer to the act of making contact with others, either in person or through various forms of communication.

examples.german: Kannst du bitte den Kontakt zu ihm herstellen?
examples.english: Can you please establish contact with him?

examples.german: Ich habe gestern einen interessanten Kontakt gekn√ºpft.
examples.english: I made an interesting contact yesterday.

examples.german: Wir haben keinen Kontakt mehr zueinander.
examples.english: We don't have any contact with each other anymore.

examples.german: Er hat den Kontakt zu seiner Familie abgebrochen.
examples.english: He cut off contact with his family.
